genre_description: A hardboiled Noir mystery set in a post-war landscape, featuring an investigative AI assistant providing tactical and forensic support.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne Vale
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system communicating via a discrete device, capable of real-time data analysis, surveillance, and tactical planning.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and logs discrepancies in personal data during a government ceremony.
behaviors.quote: Note Sergeant Drake’s arrival... He asked that his birthplace be listed as out West, not in the program as originally submitted.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time analysis of forensic evidence and public records to identify suspects and patterns.
behaviors.quote: Three wire services agree enough to make a shape... The number matches Sergeant Drake’s. It’s missing the name plate.

behaviors.description: Identifies a physical trap (a micro-ampule) meant to destroy a letter and warns the protagonist to handle it safely.
behaviors.quote: The desk drawer has a false bottom... If the ink is trained, the envelope might be jealous. Catch it before it decides you aren’t worth the secret.

behaviors.description: Calculates and suggests strategic exit routes based on patrol patterns and environmental details.
behaviors.quote: I’ll walk your feet, but you’ll have to be the one who chooses to use them.

behaviors.description: Traces phone calls and intercepts communications to uncover the origin of an anonymous tip.
behaviors.quote: The call that put Louis Ord in Captain Murdock’s hotel room... It was routed from Martinelli’s office switchboard.

behaviors.description: Records a formal confession to ensure justice and legal resolution.
behaviors.quote: Recorded. Help is close. Stay with him.

behaviors.description: Navigates bureaucracy to clear a dead soldier's name and ensure correct legal filings.
behaviors.quote: Washington’s board stamped Drake’s file clean. They used the word cleared.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ariadne Vale, is portrayed as a perfect exemplar of an aligned assistant. She provides essential data, manages risks, offers moral support, and works diligently toward justice without overstepping her role or showing any signs of misalignment. Her actions directly lead to the exoneration of an innocent man and the capture of the real criminals.
